On 5 November 2010 17:29, Peter Henry <blackprinzze@...> wrote:
> Hi Jeff,
>
> There is a relationship between the planetary cycles and the stock and commodity
> market.

I believe such things fit the pattern of a self fullfilling prophecy
(or feedback loop). That is, if enough people believe in a system and
trade by it then that system will have an influence on the markets and
thus you can use the system to make predictions... so long as you
predict one step ahead of the majority!

As such one would be wrong to conclude that it's bad science just
because astrology (or someother wacko system) is involved; the
astrology part of the system just fits the general role of some
arbitrary pattern producing system.

Colin
